price: 48 Or, vivaient dans la cité neuf bons à rien dont la seule occupation était d’y semer la corruption et le péché.
arabic: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
